description: The BBQ chicken pizza is a mainstay at many restaurants and bars, but if you're struggling to find the perfect cocktail for it, try making your own!The Hellraiser Picnic cocktail is a salty yet sweet treat that will make anyone feel like summertime has finally arrived. Its fruit-forward flavor is reminiscent of warm days spent outside under an umbrella or by poolside with friends. It’s the one of the best&nbsp;must-try cocktails for chicken pizzas!
